timeline.bodyText: Trust store should be in one word
timeline.author: aaparent
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -263,3 +261,20 @@ DataBricksInfoForm.check.endPoint=EndPoint Label must be specified
 DataBricksInfoForm.check.clusterID=Cluster ID must be specified
 DataBricksInfoForm.check.token=Token Key must be specified
 DataBricksInfoForm.check.dbfsDepFolder=DBFS dependencies folder must be specified
+HadoopClusterForm.button.useCustomConf.label=Use custom Hadoop configuration
+HadoopClusterForm.button.overrideCustomConf=Set path to custom Hadoop configuration JAR
+HadoopClusterForm.button.overrideCustomConfPath.browse=Select Hadoop configuration file from local file system
+HadoopClusterForm.button.config=Configuration
+HadoopClusterForm.group.customConf=Custom Hadoop configuration
+HadoopClusterForm.webHDFS.encryption=WebHDFS Encryption
+HadoopClusterForm.webHDFS.encryption.useSSLEncryption=Use SSL encryption
+HadoopClusterForm.webHDFS.encryption.useSSLEncryption.trustStorePath=TrustStore path
+HadoopClusterForm.webHDFS.encryption.useSSLEncryption.trustStorePassword=TrustStore password
+HadoopClusterForm.webHDFS.check.trustStorePath=Trust store path must be specified

replies.bodyText: Will fix for next export - Tracking in jira I18N-157. Not a blocker for merging imo.
replies.author: sbouyer
